summary: This is an email forwarding a courtesy copy of an ECF filing in the case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330) from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim. It includes a COVID-19 notice about remote work and confidentiality disclaimers.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell, sending a courtesy copy of an ECF filing in the case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).

connections.description: Bobbi C. Sternheim is the defense attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell in the criminal case.

events.title: ECF Filing in Maxwell Case
events.description: An ECF (Electronic Case Filing) was submitted in the criminal case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding a courtesy copy of an ECF filing in the criminal case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
Bobbi C. Sternheim is identified as the defense attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell.
The email includes a COVID-19 notice stating the West 19th Street office is closed and work is being done remotely.
The correspondence contains standard legal confidentiality and privilege disclaimers.
